passage.title: Once a year
passage.paragraph: Tom finishes school when he is eighteen year old. He wants to work at a bank in the city. He goes to the bank and asks for a job there. A man takes him into a small room and gives him questions on a piece of paper. Tom writes the answers on the paper in a hurry. The man looks for a few minutes, and then says, "Is your birthday on the 12th of December, Tom?"
"Oh, once a year, sir," says Tom.
